settings.title: Is my payment data safe with you?
settings.content: All direct payment gateways adhere to the standards set by PCI-DSS as managed by the PCI Security Standards Council, which is a joint effort of brands like Visa, MasterCard, American Express, and Discover.

settings.title: Do you accept online payments?
settings.content:
Yes, we accept online payments. All payment processing and vital customer information is quick, easy, and secure.

Learn more about our store's safe checkout experience (powered by Shopify) here.

settings.title: Where can I learn more about the payment and processing on your store?
settings.content: For more insight, you may also want to read Shopifyâ€™s Terms of Service here or Privacy Statement here.

settings.title: What forms of payment do you accept?
settings.content: We accept payments from major credit card companies like Visa, Mastercard, and American Express.

settings.title: Payments & Safety
How long does it take to get my products?
settings.content:
Domestic shipping can take up to 5 business days.

Foreign shipping could take up to 14 business days.

Due to global supply chain challenges, shipping times could be longer than usual.

settings.title: How much does it cost?
settings.content:
Shipping rates can vary depending on your region and are calculated at checkout.

Here are the full details of our Shipping Policy.

settings.title: Is there free shipping?
settings.content: Yes, we offer free shipping for large domestic orders. Check the cart to see the current deal on free shipping..

settings.title: Do you ship internationally?
settings.content:
Yes, we ship our products all over the globe.

Please note that free shipping is not applicable for international orders and that shipping rates could vary depending on your region.

settings.title: Do you ship to my area?
settings.content:
A full list of all of our shipping areas can be found here.

If your country or region is not mentioned, please feel free to reach out to see if we can work out the details.

settings.title: Shipping & Delivery
Do you offer warranty for your products?
settings.content:
All our products are subject to quality control.

Our warranty provides a guarantee against manufacturer defects.

The guarantee covers any manufacturing, design, or material defect. Please notify us within 2 months of noticing any defects.

It does not cover blows, improper use, or other issues that are not attributable to a manufacturer defects.

settings.title: Do you offer extended warranty?
settings.content:
An extended warranty can be added to your products for an additional cost.

Please get in touch for more information about extended warranties.

settings.title: How much does extended warranty cost?
settings.content:
The extended warranty could come at a different cost depending on the type of product and extended period.

Please get in touch for more information.

settings.title: Warranty & Repair
Do you offer refunds?
settings.content:
Yes, we offer full and partial refunds.

Please enquire for more information about our Refund policy.

settings.title: How long after I complete a purchase can I ask for a refund?
settings.content: A refund request can be submitted within a month after the purchase is made.

settings.title: How much can I get refunded?
settings.content:
In the case when theproduct and packaging are unopened and undamaged, you areeligiblefor a full refund.

In the case whenthe packaging has been opened and the product has been used, you areeligiblefor a partial refund.

In the case when aproduct has been damaged, and the damage is not covered by your warranty, you arenot eligiblefor a refund.

Please check our Terms of Service to see if you're eligible for a refund.

settings.title: Who pays the shipping costs in the case of a refund when the order doesn't have free shipping?
settings.content: When an order does not include free shipping, all shipping costs (including the return shipping) are handled by the customer.

settings.title: Who pays the shipping costs in the case of a refund when the order has free shipping?
settings.content: When an order includes free shipping, only the cost of the return shipping is handled by the customer.

settings.title: Returns & Refunds
